response.overview: That said... is the title of Thomas Hartmann's ninth one-man show. He's now in his mid-fifties and has realized why you rarely see yourself as old... because you're always the latest version of yourself. But is Hartmann, in his own estimation, the best version of himself? Spoiler alert: The answer is a resounding no!  The show reflects on the fallibility of humans, and in particular Thomas' own. Mistakes that we can choose to either fix or live with, but that we are always best served by laughing about.  Would life be better if you had a script, or is it good that we are often forced to improvise? Is honesty overrated? Why is social media so antisocial? How old should you be before you can become a doctor?  These questions, and many more, are addressed in the latest show by the newest version of one of the industry's oldest men. You might not get any smarter by watching it... but you'll definitely be entertained.
response.title: Når det så er sagt...
